message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll take $6,000 and you can have $4,000. We can always negotiate from here!
I'll give you a slightly smaller share this round, but I'm willing to compromise. Your turn to negotiate!
I'm not sure I want to take $3,000. I'd like to negotiate further. Can you offer a bit more?
I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll take $4,200 and you can have $5,800. This is my best offer so far!
